english: Think back on your social media use today — what stands out?
Think back on your social media use today — is there anything you plan to do differently tomorrow?
Was there anything about your social media use today that made you feel stressed? What would make it less stressful tomorrow?
What were your most and least favorite apps today? Why?
What was the main emotion you felt when using social media today? Why did you feel that way?
How do you think you'll use social media tomorrow?
Did the Locus prompts influence how you interacted with social media today?

Are there any accounts you could follow or unfollow to make life more enjoyable on <app>?

Is there anyone you're hoping to see or talk with <app>?
